description: Write stories that can be developed and tested in a matter of days

examples.description: Create stories sized for days, not weeks
content: Story takes 3-5 days to develop and test completely

examples.description: Break large work into smaller stories
content: Large feature broken into multiple stories, each completable in days

examples.description: Focus on delivering complete, testable functionality quickly
content: Each story delivers a complete piece of functionality that can be tested

examples.description: Don't create stories that span multiple weeks
content: Story requires 3+ weeks to complete (too large)

examples.description: Don't create stories that can't be tested independently
content: Story requires multiple other stories before it can be tested

examples.description: Don't create stories without clear boundaries
content: Story is vague about scope and completion criteria
